In the earlier system, when the payments were made from PIU bank account, PIUs could draw the Imprest cash from the PIU Bank account and used to meet the to cash requirement towards petty expenses. 3 However with the functioning of F&A Unit at all these PIU Bank accounts have become non-operational. 4. Accordingly, the system of Imprest cash shall be operated ni as detailed below: With the approval of the Competent Authority, each PIU shall open a bank account against approved designated personnel of NHAI to operate the Imprest cash. (ii) F&A Unit shall transfer the amount to designated Imprest Cash Bank Accounts of PIUs under their jurisdiction with the approval of RO. (iii) Authorized person at PIU shall withdraw the cash to meet their expenses requirement. (iv) PIUs shall periodically submits the expenditure incurred details to FGA Unit for scrutiny & financial concurrence. 5_ FGA Unit shall replenish the PIU Imprest Cash amount by transferring such amount to the respective PIU Imprest Cash Bank Account. 6. This is issued with the approval of the Competent Authority. (Amarendra Kumar) CGM (Coord.)
